quotes.quote: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.
Even Kings and emperors with heaps of wealth and vast dominion cannot compare with an ant filled with the love of God.
No emperor has the power to dictate to the heart.
How dangerous emperors are when they go mad.
No one would have doubted his ability to reign had he never been emperor.
The finest plans have always been spoiled by the littleness of them that should carry them out. Even emperors can't do it all by themselves.
I am Emperor, my descendants will be numerous. From the second generation to the ten thousandth, my line will not end.
Christianity ruined emperors, but saved peoples.
An emperor in his nightcap will not meet with half the respect of an emperor with a glittering crown.
The supreme nobility of a Roman emperor does not consist in being a master of slaves, but in being a lord of free men, who loves freedom even in those who serve him.
Better a living beggar than a buried emperor.
If the emperor and the palace officials cannot get along well, the country will surely come to extinction.
At all times an empire is more important than emperor and empress, prince and princess.
The only emperor is the emperor of ice cream.
It becomes an emperor to die standing.
Praise the Emperor whose sacrifice is life as ours is death.
You don't need to work hard to earn an empire; there is an army of slaves to do it for you.
Only he who has no use for the empire is fit to be entrusted with it.
Being a king, emperor, or president is mighty small potatoes compared to being a mother.
The souls of emperors and cobblers are cast in the same mould.
The emperor indeed is within the Church, not about the Church.
Traitors who prevail are patriots usurpers who succeed are divine emperors.
An Emperor confides in national soldiers, not in mercenaries.
The emperor is just a man, after all.
Genius is not a retainer to any emperor.
